reviewText: I think alot of people pass this one up because its a Blockbuster video item, however upon viewing I found it very informative, highly interesting, and concise. Makes you wonder what makes these criminals tick. Never boring and you find out things you didn't know on these subjects. Plus its not on dvd. Documentary include Charles Manson, D.B. Cooper, Richard Loeb and Nathan Leopold, Clifford Irving, and Albert De Salvo
